markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Primal Magic Terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=1552)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 220 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
In areas of primal magic, plant life is lusher, experiences are more vivid, and instincts are sharper—the land itself seems vibrant and alive. Creatures who cast a primal spell here gain a +10- foot status bonus to Speeds until the end of their next turn.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Primal Magic Terrain
search_markdown:
<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 220 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

Book of Unlimited Magic / Pervasive Magic / Magical Terrain
</additional-info>
text: Primal Magic Terrain Source Secrets of Magic pg. 220 1.1 In areas of primal magic, plant life is lusher, experiences are more vivid, and instincts are sharper—the land itself seems vibrant and alive. Creatures who cast a primal spell here gain a +10- foot status bonus to Speeds until the end of their next turn.
